title: Tui Sudhu Amar
overview: Pikoo and Priya are madly in love but struggling to make it big in their respective field, when opportunity strikes in the form of a big contract from Singha Roy Group of Industriues which requires the couple to travel to London. However, things take a turn to worse when Aditya, the sole owner of the company, falls in love with Priya and starts wooing her.
